body:
I have the same issue in Linux, running "mlflow" fails because the script is broken.

Bad mlflow script - installed with conda-forge:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3976753/67115767-d5933300-f1d6-11e9-9801-c299bc3a717b.png)

If I just replace the first lines before the utf-8 encoding to "#!/usr/bin/env python" in the mlflow script, mlflow fully works.
Thanks. Unfortunately, this won't work on Windows as the offending file is a Windows executable.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
I have this same issue. Any way for a windows user to fix this?
Thank you for interacting with this issue! Removing the stale label!

Same here with mlflow 1.4.0 Build py37_0 from conda-forge (Windows 10):
```Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"d:\bld\mlflow_1572494804636\_h_env\python.exe"  "D:\Anaconda3\envs\blt-images\Scripts\mlflow.exe" '```

*workaround* using conda+pip:
```
>conda install mlflow --only-deps
>pip install mlflow
```
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

Same issue with conda-forge on Windows 10
 `Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"d:\bld\mlflow_1577494297948\_h_env\python.exe"  "C:\Users\xxxxx\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\envs\apple\Scripts\mlflow.exe" --version'`
Thank you for interacting with this issue! Removing the stale label!

I have exactly similar issue, mlflow installed from conda 
```
Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using
d:\bld\mlflow_1577494297948\_h_env\python.exe
```

Windows 10
Python 3.7.6
mlflow-1.5.0-py37_1
Same.  works with pip install, but not conda-forge version.
Tried `conda install mlflow mlflow-ui-dbg`? https://github.com/conda-forge/mlflow-feedstock#installing-mlflow and I get the same issue.

I'm on Windows 10 and hit the same issue with `conda install -c conda-forge mlflow`. 

**Error**:
Fatal error in launcher: Unable to create process using '"d:\bld\mlflow_1583244\_h_env\python.exe"  "C:\Users\Miniconda3\envs\metis\Scripts\mlflow.exe" ui': The system cannot find the file specified.


Then had no issue once I used `pip install mlflow`.
I'm getting this issue too, even after re-installing with pip
Same error for me as well.
This should be fixed by https://github.com/conda-forge/mlflow-feedstock/pull/65 and can be closed.

I downloaded the mlflow-ui-dbg package from conda and it worked.

conda install -c conda-forge mlflow-ui-dbg
